body_html: That's true, but code that runs with hard placement successfully should place ops no differently than code that runs with soft placement (soft placement only does something different if the ops are not implemented on the device the user specified).
body_text: That's true, but code that runs with hard placement successfully should place ops no differently than code that runs with soft placement (soft placement only does something different if the ops are not implemented on the device the user specified).
body: That's true, but code that runs with hard placement successfully should place ops no differently than code that runs with soft placement (soft placement only does something different if the ops are not implemented on the device the user specified).
